code: export var getWidthForSeats=function getWidthForSeats(seats){var fullWIdth=Math.min(window.innerHeight,window.innerWidth);switch(seats){case 0:return 0;case 1:return fullWIdth;case 2:return fullWIdth/2;case 3:return fullWIdth/(1+2/Math.sqrt(3));case 4:return fullWIdth/(1+Math.sqrt(2));case 5:return fullWIdth/(1+Math.sqrt(2*(1+1/Math.sqrt(5))));case 6:return fullWIdth/3;case 7:return fullWIdth/4;default:return fullWIdth/4;}};export var getDistanceRatioForSeats=function getDistanceRatioForSeats(seats){if(seats<2)return 0;var width=getWidthForSeats(seats);var fullWIdth=Math.min(window.innerHeight,window.innerWidth);return 50-width/2/fullWIdth*100;};
